Progress Badges

Progress badges will only use default Luminate Milestone Dadges (Personal Donor, Team and Individual Milestones) unless using the customBadgeData attrbute to set custom badges. If using customBadgeData must format as an array of objects with the following properties: url, name, and text (optional).

Examples

Showing an individual's default badges by setting individual consitiuent id.

<div progress-badges fr-id="1070" type="individual" id="1001493"></div>

Showing an individual's badges by passing badge data through customBadgeData attribute. Must format attribute as an array with the following properties: url, name, and text (optional). Example can be seen in this pages Controller. Can use this method to pass default badges, or create custom badges.

<div progress-badges custom-badge-data="participantBadges"></div>
